conversation.message: We appreciate your interest in our curriculum and daily structure, Parent_A. Fostering early social development is one of our core strengths. Our daily structure incorporates extended periods of 'choice time' in small, mixed-age groups, allowing children to practice negotiation, collaboration, and empathy in real-time scenarios. We utilize a positive behavior support framework, focusing heavily on emotional literacy and conflict resolution skills taught through role-playing and guided discussions. This approach ensures a supportive environment where children learn to communicate their needs effectively and respect others. We are very eager to share more details with you. Please let us know if you have further questions or wish to proceed.
